title: Quiz 7: Comprehensive Practical Exam
description: Comprehensive practical assessment covering MS Word formatting, Excel data analysis, Access DB management, and PowerPoint presentation.

questions.question: In MS Word, which feature was requested to add 'Quacks of HRIM Profession' at the end of the document?
questions.explanation: Word Task 6: 'Insert an endnote with the following word...'.
questions.hint: It appears at the end of the document.

questions.question: In Excel, what function was used to calculate the 'standard deviation' of patients' ages?
questions.explanation: Excel Task 4 asks to 'Calculate the... standard deviation of the patients' ages'.
questions.hint: The function name is an abbreviation of Standard Deviation.

questions.question: Arrange the steps to split the 'Blood Pressure' column in Excel (Task 5):

items.text: Go to Data Tab > Text to Columns
Select Delimited and choose '/' as delimiter
Rename new columns to Systolic and Diastolic

questions.explanation: To split '120/80', you use Text to Columns with the slash delimiter.
questions.hint: You need to select the data first, then use the data tool.

questions.question: Which of the following tables were required for the 'HealthcareManagement' database in Access? (Select all that apply)
questions.explanation: The Access section lists Patients, Appointments, MedicalHistory, and Prescriptions tables.
questions.hint: Check the Table Design section of the Access task.

questions.question: What is the password required to encrypt the Access database?
questions.explanation: Backup task: 'Save the ... database with the password FQE001'.
questions.hint: It's the same as your folder name suffix.

questions.question: In the PowerPoint section, Slides 1, 2, and 3 require a 'Split' transition.
questions.explanation: Task 3 says: 'Create transition for slide 1, 2 and 3 as wipe'. Split is for slides 4 and 5.
questions.hint: Check the specific transition requested for the first three slides.

questions.question: Which chart type was requested for Slide 5 in PowerPoint?
questions.explanation: PowerPoint Task 2: 'Create a stacked column chart in slide 5'.
questions.hint: It shows parts of a whole across categories.

questions.question: In the Access Advanced Query, the criteria `((Appointments.AppointmentDate)>=Date())` filters for appointments that are ___BLANK___.
questions.explanation: Date() returns today. >=Date() means today or in the future (upcoming).
questions.hint: It refers to time relative to today.
